TopicTitle: How to Forcefully update your ship to the latest version in 3 steps

Articles.Content:
1. Go to KSP_Win/Saves/(save name)/ SPH or VAB/Your Craft Name

2.Open it up with your favourite text editor

3. Change the version on the top to the latest version (right now 0.20.2)
will this work to downgrade? (some of the 20.2 vessels to 20.0)
Probably not, unless you made sure that all of the new parts have been replaced to ones that are available in the previous version.
Umm, but if you force the game to accept the save/craft file without changing anything else then won't it be completely bugged? And besides, craft files have not been not compatible since .18.
